newsitem.title: USA: Multimedia Games to launch new bingo game.
newsitem.headline: Multimedia Games to launch new bingo game.

text.p: Multimedia Games Inc said Wednesday it will launch a low-cost version of its interactive bingo game MegaMania.
The new version will cost players $0.10 per card instead of $0.25, the company said. Multimedia Games said the lower price is expected to boost the number of new players.
The company said it also submitted 10 games to the National Indian Gaming Commission for approval in response to suggestions made by the regulatory agency.
Multimedia Games provides gaming services through its exclusive contracts with more than 50 Indian nations.
